website_summaries.verdict: A colorful, heavier-weight tamper that makes an attractive addition to your coffee-brewing nook. You'll want to leave this one out on display.
pros: Flat and smooth bottom distributes pressure evenly
Ergonomic.Comes in red, blue, or rose handle
Decent weight, at more than 11 oz
cons: Handle can come unscrewed from the tamper

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bialetti stove top espresso make and the coffee was pretty good. Now the coffee tastes like espresso because when u you compress the coffee grinds it helps to build up pressure and produce espresso. Plus the unit is heavy and well built.

customer_reviews.title: use it daily and love it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well-Built
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations in terms of design and build quality. It's got a good heft to it and seems to be very well machined. A big improvement to the cheap plastic tamps these 49mm group heads come with.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: Joyce Havstad

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much I got two
customer_reviews.text: Liked so much I got two! Not only does it look good, but feels excellent in my hand. Watch for the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Rusted Tamping Surface
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty substantial for the price but mine came with some slight rust on the tamping surface (quality of materials in question) which will probably get worse over time so I may figure on sanding the metal and treating it to avoid further complications down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rice

customer_reviews.title: simple beauty and quality
customer_reviews.text: I was using an ugly, very light-weight homemade device as an espresso tamper; my coffee tasted not-so good until I received the Zoe+Cloe stainless steel tamper. This coffee tamper not only greatly improved the taste of my daily double espresso, its red color and beautiful design also complemented my red-trimmed IMUSA espresso machine. Its whopping [almost 11.96 OZ] weight and the perfect fit into my espresso machine’s coffee basket were beyond my expectations. I am very satisfied with its simple beauty and quality. Worth every dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: hunterking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at and a pleasure to hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tamper that has some heft and feels great in the hand. The color is beautiful and it's easy to clean. I have the red. I use it with my Krups XP-1000 espresso machine and the 49mm size fits well. Because it's not flimsy or plastic you need almost no pressure to tamp the coffee. It cleans with a simple brushing of any coffee that's on it but it's safe to wash. I leave it on my counter, not so much for the ease of use, but because I like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Love my 49mm tamper
customer_reviews.text: I love the Zoei. After evaluating other tamper, I decided on the Zoei because of its weight and its beautiful red color. I bought it initially for my Rok Presso, but I have used it with Capresso and it works very well, casually it's 49mm both. Very happy with my new play of my passion, the coffee
customer_reviews.author: mreyes104

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The bottom of the tamper tends to loosen ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The bottom of the tamper tends to loosen from the handle so I have to make sure it is tightened before I use it. I twist the tamper when using and I'm sure that is why but when it is tightened, it should stay that way. I love the color because it matches the front of my espresso maker.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have solid control over the pressure applied to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have solid control over the pressure applied to the coffee grounds. It allows me to use a slightly coarser grind on the ROK espresso machine.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality tamper. As near as I can tell it measures exactly 49mm on my dial caliper. Very nicely machined, comfortable in the hand. This proves to me that a good tamper needn't cost half a fortune. I wish it came in something other than hot pink and baby blue (candy apple red or midnight blue would be nice), but eh; nothing to ding it for, especially at this price. Now it'd be nice if the filter basket on the Rok I bought along with this tamper also measured 49mm like it says in its description. Alas, it's ~50.1mm. Anyway, that's beside the point - EXCELLENT JOB ON THIS TAMPER.
customer_reviews.author: jon dot org

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Consistant Espresso Tamper
customer_reviews.text: The best 49mm espresso I've used to date. Very solid construction, a nice weight and fits naturally in your hand. I use this tamper with the La Pavoni Pre-Millennium 49mm Double Portafilter Basket, and it works perfectly. This tamper creates a very even espresso surface that has drastically improved the consistency of my shots. If you're looking for a 49mm espresso tamper, this is the one for you!
